channel.title: Journal on Mila Frerichs
channel.description: Recent content in Journal on Mila Frerichs

item.title: Work Journal: March 31st
item.description: I want to share more what I do every day, so I’m starting this (weekly) journal after inspiration from Adam Wathan. Love what the guy is doing so I will do something similar. Waiting list for my upcoming online-course This week started off very well with the public launch of the waiting list for my upcoming Online Workshop about “Geospatial Data Visualization with d3”. I’m excited about the launch of the waiting list for my first product.
